name: Mr Rental: The Video Game
description:
DISCLAIMER: This is a non-profit parody game developed by a group of dedicated fans. The development team has no affiliation with SiIvaGunner or any of the copyrighted material's owners. The game is currently unfinished and will improve in the future. It also has nothing to do with the previous attempts at making the game, including Prabowo Muhammad's trailers.

Mr Rental: The Video Game, an adaptation of the fake game of the same name from SiIvaGunner rips, is in development once again! Created by the community, for the community, the game is converted into real game.

Including: 

-2D platforming action based on the fake game and Australian Feastivus event, as accurate to Prabowo Muhammad's videos as possible

-3 playable characters: Mr Rental, Sweet Grapes (from Strawberry Shortcake's Berry Bitty Adventures), and Blythe Baxter (from Littlest Pet Shop)   

-Original music and graphics 

-An original storyline: save the world of Prabowo Muhammad from the N. Trance's force of internet memes 

-Lots of hidden secrets and unlockable content such as mini-games, fanarts, etc.

-LORE

-and more...

Subscribe to our YouTube channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCAhhXr2ZRQUrQGczke_5vKg/videos

Listen to our Soundcloud too: https://soundcloud.com/cherrys-timezone-radio-2

Mr Rental: The Video Game uses assets created by the SiIvaGunner team as the fake game. That fake project in turn used assets from the Prabowo Muhammad video "Trailer Theme (Out-of-Game Mix) - Sonic Mania" as well as some assets from Mighty Gunvolt Burst, Angry Video Game Nerd Adventures, and Deltarune. The original authors of these assets do not necessarily personally endorse nor disapprove of this project.

Note: the game is still very much in development. However, its direction has been changed dramatically. As such, we're not ready to share anything about it or any other related work. Please stay tuned for more info on our YT channel and this page.
